1.content:
Roy heard his alarm go off and moved his hand groggy towards the snooze. For an odd reason Roy was not able to hit the button. He swiped at it a few more times unsuccessfully before the alarm went silent. The alarm was set to 9:45 Roy had a cartoon he had waited all week to watch that started at 10.
Roy opened his eyes and realized that he was under what seemed like a pile of covers.
"Mary" Roy thought.
Roy's little sister was always playing tricks on him, and she had covered him with covers before. Roy pushed at the covers but found, for some reason, they seemed very heavy.
"Oh, I am so going to get her back." Roy thought as he squirmed under the covers. Roy moved to the bottom of his bed and then popped his head out from under the covers. The Morning sun gleamed into his eyes, and it took a second for then to adjust before Roy saw that he was a....
1.title: Covered

11.content:
Roy's eyes adjusted to the light, and then he looked around the room. Everything looked so big and different.
"Ahh, my head hurts" Roy said before bringing his paw up to his temple and then noticed the fur on his arm. Roy's hand trembled a bit and then grazed at his ears before Roy felt something rub against his leg. Roy let out a shriek and then scrambled free of the blankets then looked down at his tail.
"Oh, it is just my tail....I thought it was something ba...." Roy stopped then looked at the appendage.
"My tail!!!!" Roy rushed to his feet only to fall onto all fours and then attempted to run away from the tail. Then stopped on the middle of the blanket and looked at himself.
"I..I'm a mouse."Roy said to himself before the sound of the door opening ran into Roy's huge ears.
The door swung open and Roy saw..
11.title: Mouse

111.content:
Roy looked at his mom Julie with a reassurance. She will know what to do Roy thought as he looked up at his mother towering over the bed.
"Mom.. It's me.." Roy shouted up to Julie. The little mouse scampered around on the blanket and then ran up to His mom's hand.
"Mom... Do you hear my Mom it is Roy" the little mouse said as he stood next to Julie's giant hand.

1111.content:
Julie tucked her hand under the corner of the bed and clutched the sheet and then hurled it over the top of Roy. Julie grabbed the rest of the sheet and tossed it into a laundry basket then started walking around Roy's room grabbing loose clothing and flinging them in the basket. Roy moved about the maze of cotton and then popped his head up from the sheet just in time to see his mom grab the basket.
There was a sudden rush that left Roy light headed as the basket was lifted up to Julie's waist before she started to walk towards the laundry room.
Julie tossed the basket on top of the dryer and was about to throw the entire pile of clothes into the washer.
"Ring..... Ring.... Ring...." Julie reached to her pocket.
"Darn it. Must have left it in the den." Julie rushed out of the room and into the living Room.
1111.title: Laundry day.

choices: Roy lands on some folded towels "clean"

11112.content:
"OK, see you later then byes" Julie hung up the phone and then seen Mary walking into the room holding her blanket.
"Cartoons are on honey" Julie said as she watched Mary turn on the TV and then set down on the couch laying the blanket over her side.
"Mommy can we take Ashley to the pet store. I want to show her all the little cute mice." Mary said as she laid the blanket on the couch.
" Sure we can, we will have a little time before we take her back to her house." Julie revealed as she picked up the blanket and then walked into the laundry room.
"Mommy.." Mary said in a booming voice so her mother could hear.
"One second.." Julie tossed the blanket in the washer then grabbed the rest of the clothes in a rush and then threw them in before dropping in a bit of soap and closing the lid. Roy was tossed about before hearing a resounding "tong" as the lid came down. A little light shinned through the lid and Roy looked around at all the sides and clothes. There was the sound of clicking then Roy heard water rushing in.
"Mom!" Roy yelled but was dwarfed by the sound of the water. The washer filled up with water and Roy managed to scamper and swim to the top of the clothing before the water stopped.
"It stopped" Roy smiled before he heard a few clicks then there was a sudden jolt. Roy looked down at the clothing and then at the agitator in the middle.
"Oh I hate baths.." Roy said as he scampered away from the clothing that was getting sucked down. Roy managed to stay on top of the clothing as it churned around and was then whipped against the side like a carnival ride during the first spin cycle feeling the clothing become dry a bit.
Roy was soaked and climbed up the sides as the rinse cycle began and then once again managed to stay away from being sucked down.
"This is not so bad, as long as I can stay away from" Roy felt his paw get wrapped around a piece of clothing, and before he could move was sucked under the water. The clothing churned as Roy tried to hold his breath feeling his lungs slowly lose the air.
The washer suddenly stopped and the final spin cycle began. Roy took a deep breath of air before the drum started to turn around. Roy was pushed against the clothing, but managed to get on the outside and was pushed into it a bit as the washer sped up faster and faster.
"To.. fast.." Roy said feeling his head become light before the drum stopped. Julie opened the lid and then reached in and grabbed the clothing and tossed it into the dryer... Roy was flung into the air and let out a little sequel before landing...
11112.title: "Oh, I hate Baths"

"Mouse!" Julie screams before she grabs the broom. Roy swiftly gets his senses about him and scampers off of the towel and out into the hallway before running into..

Roy runs into Mary's room and stops under Mary's desk. Looking around Roy is overjoyed to see Mary is not in there.
"Finally a break." Roy's things as he feels his heart racing in his chest down and begins looking around the room.
"I just need to think of how this could have happened." Roy thinks before the sound of a loud thud is heard across the room. Roy's hair stands up as he looses his capability to breathe momentary at the sight of Buttons.
The Cat makes her way across the room slowly watching Roy with intent. Roy knows that is he moves Buttons may pounce upon him. Even so, if he does not move she may lose interest and go back to bed.
What does Roy do?

112.content:
Mary walks in the room and looks around.
"Roy where are you mom said I am susposto wake you up." Mary said in a reluctant tone.
"Did you find hims?" Ashley said through a missing front tooth.
"No I don't know where he is." Mary said.
"Or what he is." Ashley remarked giggling.
"What do you mean what he is, He is my brother." Mary remarked.
"Well yea, he is your brother just maybe a bit differents." Ashley said kicking her legs in excitement.
"Different how." Mary asked thinking Ashley, and Roy were playing a trick.
"Well you knows how he ruined my birthday party yesterday." Ashley said in an innocent tone.
"Yea, I was so mad when he pushed my head in the cake." Mary said knowing Roy always wanted to be the center of attention.
"I know I have seen you cries, and I did not get to make my wish. So, last night when you were asleep, I made a wish." Ashley said. A feeling of something moving between the two girls brought their gaze down between them. The sight of the small mouse caused them to shriek out and jump off of the bed.
"A mouse!" Mary yelled and headed for the door before Ashley blocked her.
"Not so louds do you want everyone to know? Ashley said looking over at the small mouse trying to find a way off of the bed.
"How does it feels Roy to be a little mousy." Ashley said defiantly. Roy rose his head up looking at Mary, who was about to faint.

Ashley looked over at Mary pausing thinking about her question then said.

info.brief_description: Roy wakes up one morning to find himself turned into a animal.
info.description:
Roy wakes up one morning to find himself turned into a animal. What kind of adventures will Roy have and what will happen to him? Do your best to help Roy along his way.

Note: This interactive is for 3 to13 year old writers both to contribute to and read. It is still recommended that adults add from time to time. Although, some guidance from the age group as what way the story should go would be nice. With young grown-ups reading this, I will be watching the content closely. As always, additions are greatly appreciated just. Please keep this nice with content and descriptions under pg-13.

Here are a few characters to start out with:
Main - Roy (7)
Friend - Mark (8)
Mom - Julie (30)
Sister - Mary (6)
Mary's Friend - Ashley (4)
Buttons - Cat
